segments.text: Diana , do you like the perfume I gave you ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: It ’ s good . But to tell you the truth , I don ’ t wear perfume .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I ’ m sorry . I didn ’ t know that .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: That ’ s all right . Thank you all the same .
segments.speaker: S2
